thread.title: Robert

author: Robert
title: Robert
text: I ordered 1 inch fire glass first decided to big so I ordered half inch fire glass and when it came It is exactly the same size as the one inch. I do not know what to do. I opened one of the 10 pound bag and poured it on the floor and open on of the 20 Pound bags of the half inch and they matched the size of the one inch fire glass there was no small ones anywhere. Don't know what to do so will start looking for another company .
